name: Ffionaâ€™s Restaurant
address: 51 Kensington Church Street, London W8 4BA, United Kingdom
author: Joe J.
description:
Happy Halloween was back October 7, 2018 for dinner and it was again World Class with that touch only Ffiona can do. 
Had a fabulous veal chop with an amazing mushroom sauce OMG. Of course I had the amazing soup so fresh and that organic Parmesan salad with Ffiona's own fabulous dressing 
Just tying it makes me salivate in anticipation of my next visit!!!
Service was superb as usual and they got a new member of the family, she will fit right in so kind and genuine. All of what one would expect if there own mother was hosting a dinner. 
IF YOU HAVE NOT BEEN GO....... ITS NOT TO BE MISSED 

Ffiona's is not to be missed if your in London it's so wonderfully amazing your want to skip the tours and just have a relaxing world class sup




Going tonight can't wait...24 October 2018 will update later or see y'all there

Another fabulous supper that only Ffiona can do!
Had the second famous fish stew freshly made to order served piping hot as only the worlds best restaurant can do cannot express my delight with her Fabulous Seafood Stew like no other........brimming with fresh seafood OMG I ALREADY WANT MORE.........

Started with the super fresh organic Parmesan salad lightly topped with Ffiona's own House made salad dressing 

Then onto that seafood stew mouth is watering just thinking about it again

Can't wait to get back to London next week for another visit 

Oh almost forgot the best part of tonight was the service better than at home........gonna have to bring my mother if I can get her on the plane

Till next week.......
